title: How does the ‘Watch Together’ feature on Netflix work? - Quora

response.answer_text: As usual, I went and did some research on this feature that has people asking about it so much. And the knight in shining armor has returned from his quest. (trumpets blaring). Watch Together is a feature that was introduced to the US market in mid 2016.It's a profile all on its own which collects data on all the profiles in one account. Since different profiles have different interests in what they watch. But then there are some common films & series that all the profiles watch. This common films & series are all collected on the Watch Together profile. It offers the chance of all profile holders to have options if they ever wanna Watch something Together. Instead of wading through the endless lists of what y'all like watching to choose a certain movie when you're together. Off He Goes.
